title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 123 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 123 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）坐在天上的主阿，我向你举目。

lineList.en: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
lineList.cn: 看哪，仆人的眼睛怎样望主人的手，使女的眼睛怎样望主母的手，我们的眼睛也照样望耶和华我们的神，直到他怜悯我们。

lineList.en: Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你怜悯我们，怜悯我们。因为我们被藐视，已到极处。

lineList.en: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.
lineList.cn: 我们被那些安逸人的讥诮，和骄傲人的藐视，已到极处。
